titles.title: EITC Modernization Act
EITC Modernization Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the earned income tax credit to all taxpayers with dependents and to qualifying students, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
EITC Modernization Act
This bill extends the earned income tax credit to taxpayers with certain dependents, including children and aged dependents, and to qualifying students. It also establishes a matching grant program for tax return preparation assistance for low-income taxpayers.
